 119: bp_proc_cfg_s proc_cfg_cast_i;
 120: assign proc_cfg_cast_i = proc_cfg_i;
 121: 
 122: logic reset_r;
 123: always_ff @(posedge clk_i)
 124:   begin
 125:     if (reset_i)
 126:       reset_r <= 1'b1;
 127:     else if (cfg_w_v_i & (cfg_addr_i == bp_cfg_reg_reset_gp))
 128:       reset_r <= cfg_data_i[0];
 129:   end
 130: 
 131: logic freeze_r;
 132: always_ff @(posedge clk_i)
 133:   begin
 134:     if (reset_i)
 135:       freeze_r <= 1'b1;
 136:     else if (cfg_w_v_i & (cfg_addr_i == bp_cfg_reg_freeze_gp))
 137:       freeze_r <= cfg_data_i[0];
 138:   end

 443:      ,.cord_width_p(coh_noc_cord_width_p)
 444:      )
 445:    resp_concentrator
 446:     (.clk_i(clk_i)
 447:      ,.reset_i(reset_r)
 448: 
 449:      ,.links_i(lce_resp_link_lo)
 450:      ,.links_o(lce_resp_link_li)
 451: 
 452:      ,.concentrated_link_i(resp_concentrated_link_li)
 453:      ,.concentrated_link_o(resp_concentrated_link_lo)
 454:      );
 455: 
 456: bp_me_cce_to_wormhole_link_master
 457:  #(.cfg_p(cfg_p))
 458:  master_link

 460:    ,.reset_i(reset_r)
